verses.verse: It happened on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

and he said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> a <S%H1241><s%> calf <S%H5695><s%> from the herd for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> for a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> and offer <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

You shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3947><s%> 'Take a male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering; <S%H2403><s%> and a calf <S%H5695><s%> and a lamb, <S%H3532><s%> both a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H8549><s%> without blemish, for a burnt offering; <S%H5930><s%>

and a bull <S%H7794><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> for peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and a meal offering <S%H4503><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil: <S%H8081><s%> for today <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appears to you. <S%H7200><s%>'"

They brought <S%H3947><s%> what Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting: <S%H4150><s%> and all the congregation <S%H4150><s%> drew near <S%H7126><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> that you should do: <S%H6213><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall appear to you. <S%H7200><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Draw <S%H7126><s%> near to the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and offer <S%H6213><s%> your sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and your burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for yourself, <S%H5971><s%> and for the people; and offer <S%H6213><s%> the offering <S%H7133><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them; <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh commanded. <S%H6680><s%>"
So Aaron <S%H175><s%> drew near to the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and killed <S%H7819><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> of the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> which was for himself.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> presented <S%H7126><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> to him; <S%H2881><s%> and he dipped his finger <S%H676><s%> in the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and poured <S%H3332><s%> out the blood <S%H1818><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

but the fat, <S%H2459><s%> and the kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the cover <S%H3508><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the liver <S%H3516><s%> of the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> he burned <S%H6999><s%> upon the altar; <S%H4196><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
The flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the skin <S%H5785><s%> he burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

He killed <S%H7819><s%> the burnt offering; <S%H5930><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> delivered <S%H4672><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> to him, <S%H2236><s%> and he sprinkled it around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>
They delivered <S%H4672><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> to him, <S%H5409><s%> piece by piece, and the head: <S%H7218><s%> and he burned <S%H6999><s%> them upon the altar. <S%H4196><s%>
He washed <S%H7364><s%> the innards <S%H7130><s%> and the legs, <S%H3767><s%> and burned <S%H6999><s%> them on the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

He presented <S%H7126><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>'s offering, <S%H7133><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the goat <S%H8163><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> which was for the people, <S%H5971><s%> and killed <S%H7819><s%> it, <S%H2398><s%> and offered it for sin, like the first. <S%H7223><s%>
He presented <S%H7126><s%> the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and offered <S%H6213><s%> it according to the ordinance. <S%H4941><s%>

He presented <S%H7126><s%> the meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> and filled <S%H4390><s%> his hand <S%H3709><s%> from there, <S%H6999><s%> and burned it upon the altar, <S%H4196><s%> besides <S%H905><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> of the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

He also killed <S%H7819><s%> the bull <S%H7794><s%> and the ram, <S%H352><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> which was for the people: <S%H5971><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> delivered <S%H4672><s%> to him the blood, <S%H1818><s%> which he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar, <S%H4196><s%>

and the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the bull <S%H7794><s%> and of the ram, <S%H352><s%> the fat tail, <S%H451><s%> and that which covers <S%H4374><s%> the innards, <S%H3629><s%> and the kidneys, and the cover <S%H3508><s%> of the liver: <S%H3516><s%>
and they put <S%H7760><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> upon the breasts, <S%H2373><s%> and he burned <S%H6999><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> on the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

and the breasts <S%H2373><s%> and the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> waved <S%H5130><s%> for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

Aaron <S%H175><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> toward the people, <S%H5971><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> them; <S%H3381><s%> and he came down from offering <S%H6213><s%> the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the burnt offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and came out, <S%H3318><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> the people: <S%H5971><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to all the people. <S%H5971><s%>

There came <S%H3318><s%> forth fire <S%H784><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> upon the altar: <S%H4196><s%> and when all the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H7442><s%> they shouted, and fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces. <S%H6440><s%>
